tooltip.phantomfaces.phantom.connectedRa: The Connection is fine and working.
tooltip.phantomfaces.phantom.connectedNo: The Connection is obstructed: It is either not in Range, not in loaded Chunks or not the right type of Block for this Phantom Device.
tooltip.phantomfaces.phantom.blockInfo.d: The connected Block is %s at %s, %s, %s that is %s Blocks away.
tooltip.phantomfaces.clearStorage.desc: Place in Crafting Grid to clear storage!
tooltip.phantomfaces.booster: When placed on top of a Phantomface it will boost its range, max amount of boosters that will increase the range when on top is 3
